TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Laliavan, title = Laliavan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Laliavan} }

S.FORM: == Laliavan == u sulit nu Hulam: 拉里亞灣部落 kakilimaan i Taitung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Laliavan. u kasalumaluma' nu Laliavan sa, 26 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 83 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 80 ku tademaw, pakalatu 96%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 3 ku tademaw, pakalatu 4%. nilacul u niyazu' nu Paywan(Paiwan) u Paywan(Paiwan) a niyazu' kuyni. katuud ku Paywan(Paiwan) a tademaw itiniay a niyazu', inayay ku Sakizaya itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini mueneng, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan yincumin u siwkay nu Yincumin u Yincumin sananay, u saayaway a muenengay a tademaw itini, itini uyiniyan a subal. u sasubana'ay a kamu sa, Taywan Yincumin sa mikitinay "Timul Subal kamu cidekay " saan. u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). situlu ku kakuniza nu Yincumincu,sakacacay ku ibukelalay, sakatusa ku ibuyuay, sakatulu sa ku tangbulanay. tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 12 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bulad pulung sausi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yuwatan (58,336), Rukay (13,303), Puyuma (14,118), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taluku (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laaluwa (398), Kanakanabu (330), zuma (12,320) tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2019 a mihcan 1 a bulad pulung sausi (566,129), Pangcah (211,279), Tayan (91,021), Paywan (101,560), Yuwatan (58,994), Rukay (13,390), Puyuma (14,358), Cou (6,668), Saysiat (6,676), Yami (4,635), Saw (803), Kabalan (1,482), Taluku (31,859), Sakizaya (961), Sejek (10,202), Laaluwa (405), Kanakanabu (345), zuma (11,541)

== Laliavan == o solit no Holam: 拉里亞灣部落 kakilimaan i Taitong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Laliavan. o kasalomaloma' no Laliavan sa, 26 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 83 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 80 ko tademaw, pakalato 96%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 3 ko tademaw, pakalato 4%. nilacol o niyazo' no Paywan(Paiwan) o Paywan(Paiwan) a niyazo' koyni. katood ko Paywan(Paiwan) a tademaw itiniay a niyazo', inayay ko Sakizaya itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini moeneng, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan yincomin o siwkay no Yincomin o Yincomin sananay, o saayaway a moenengay a tademaw itini, itini oyiniyan a sobal. o sasobana'ay a kamo sa, Taywan Yincomin sa mikitinay "Timol Sobal kamo cidekay " saan. o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). sitolo ko kakoniza no Yincominco,sakacacay ko ibokelalay, sakatosa ko iboyoay, sakatolo sa ko tangbolanay. tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 12 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bolad polong saosi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yowatan (58,336), Rokay (13,303), Poyoma (14,118), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taloko (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laalowa (398), Kanakanabo (330), zoma (12,320) tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2019 a mihcan 1 a bolad polong saosi (566,129), Pangcah (211,279), Tayan (91,021), Paywan (101,560), Yowatan (58,994), Rokay (13,390), Poyoma (14,358), Coo (6,668), Saysiat (6,676), Yami (4,635), Saw (803), Kabalan (1,482), Taloko (31,859), Sakizaya (961), Sejek (10,202), Laalowa (405), Kanakanabo (345), zoma (11,541)
